instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add Manrope, Inter, and JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. THEME SETUP: Configure tailwind.config.js with the 'Clinical Precision' colors.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Control Room' grid for the Dashboard and 'Tetris' grid for the Case Sheet.
4. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components to match the 'Technical' style (sharper corners, specific borders).
5. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
6. MOTION: Add subtle entrance animations to all cards and list items.
7. DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle noise textures.
8. ENSURE high contrast for all text. Medical data must be legible.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - generic, centered, low-contrast designs.
Micro-animations for every interaction (hover, click, focus).
